Non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs 
Aspirin and other Salicylates Delay in start of labor, premature  closing of ductus arteriosus, jaundice, brain 
damage in the fetus and bleeding problems in the woman during and after delivery 
and in the newborn. 
Antibiotics 
Tetracycline Slowed bone growth, permanent yellowing of the teeth and increased 
susceptibility to cavities in the body. 
Chloramphenicol Gray Baby Syndrome.
